properties.name: cmsio.database.jdbc.defaultName
properties.description: Default connection name (Just a alias for the connection). ex: cmsio

properties.name: cmsio.database.jdbc.driverClassName
properties.description: Driver class name for JDBC connection. Default: oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver

properties.name: cmsio.database.jdbc.user
properties.description: A user from database. It's optional.

properties.name: cmsio.database.jdbc.password
properties.description: A text plain password or an encoded password from database. It's optional.

properties.name: cmsio.database.jdbc.security.encoded
properties.description: Encoded password enabled. It's optional. Default: true

properties.name: cmsio.database.jdbc.security.secureRandom
properties.description: Secure random encoder enabled. It's optional. Default: true

properties.name: cmsio.database.jdbc.security.strength
properties.description: Strength security value. It's optional. Default: 10
